document_data.caption: A map showing Talathgard in northwest Halruaa.
document_data.name: Talathgard
document_data.mainbody: '''Talathgard''' was a fortress located in northwest [[Halruaa]].
document_data.Description: Talathgard served to guard the entrance to the [[High Temple of Mystra|large cavern and temple complex]] located beneath [[Mount Talath]].
document_data.Defenses: 200 mountain men patrolled the area and protected both Talathgard and Mount Talath from attack.
